channel.title: 翻译 on BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in 翻译 on BLOG

item.title: 赵粤的《时尚COSMO》杂志翻译
item.description: 写在前面 A little words before 我的英语水平相当有限，但我想把赵粤接受《时尚COSMO》的采访内容分享给可能看不懂中文的海外粉丝朋友。 里面有一些专用的中文词汇，如果你不明白的话，可以点击我附上的链接查看这些词语的具体含义。 如果您发现了我翻译中的问题，或者您能提供更高质量的翻译，我非常感谢。 My English is not very good, but I want to share Zhao Yue’s interview on COSMO emagazine with overseas fans who may not be able to read Chinese. There are some special Chinese words in it. If you don’t understand, you can click the link I attached to see the specific explanation. If you find any mistakes in my translation, or if you can provide a higher quality translation, I would be very grateful.
